name: Wargame: North Africa
description:
Take command at "the end of beginning" and feel the heat of burning sand. North African Campaign was one of the most legendary battles in World War II, where 2 great generals arose and made the names. Choose your best unit wisely from the vast armoury and fight their way out of the siege of Tobruk, to the port of Benghazi, set a trap to defeat the desert fox at El Alamein, and chase all the way into Tunisia.



Features:
-Historical campaign from 4 countries presented in North African Campaign in WWII: UK, Germany, Italy and US.
-Over 100 units available, from various infantry to tanks, armored cars, long range artillery artillery and planes.
-Realistic weapon settings, weaponry capability are closely related to real history stats. Feel the unstoppable Matilda in 1941 and the even more devastating Tiger in later stage.
-Era settings, units availability are decided according to its production era, technical advantage constantly shifting between Axis and Allied, choose your units wisely.
